editorialSummary.text: Apple retail store selling iPhones, iPads & more in sleekly designed spaces.

originalText.text:
Lovely Apple Store it is located close to Juilliard and other attractions. The area is worth checking out.
The store has the latest items and it‚Äôs a seamless process to make appointment.

text.text:
Lovely Apple Store it is located close to Juilliard and other attractions. The area is worth checking out.

originalText.text: Bryan T was extremely helpful at my apple appointment today. I lost my iphone and was extremely distraught. He helped me find the best strategy for replacement and had a very calming presence the entire session. It is very clear that his is extremely knowledgeable in addition to being a very kind person. Highly recommend his assistance in any apple related matter.

text.text: Bryan T was extremely helpful at my apple appointment today. I lost my iphone and was extremely distraught. He helped me find the best strategy for replacement and had a very calming presence the entire session. It is very clear that his is extremely knowledgeable in addition to being a very kind person. Highly recommend his assistance in any apple related matter.

originalText.text:
Typically had an ok experience here, but with the rapidly changing staff, many of whom don‚Äôt seem to have ever worked in customer service, the staff attitude is terrible here. This lady in particular, was very short and rude with us, super aggressive in her stance and speech. She rapidly starting talking and punching options on the phone, and when we asked her to hold on and go slow, she walked away saying, it‚Äôs ok if you want to do it yourself.
Not sure how she became involved in customer service cause she could use a course in manners for sure. Seems to be typical of customer service nowadays, with rudeness and impatience being at the forefront of their behavior

They also tricked us into taking a refurbished piece in exchange for a 2 week old iPhone 15 that stopped working, instead of taking the return and handing us a brand new one. Not ok w this kind of deceit when have paid $2000 for a phone.

We started asking another person our questions, and he was super patient, but also seemed like a senior member, so we had a mixed experience. We were told now we have to take the refurbished piece only, so we had no choice, and got a piece that showed a cost of $699 for a $2000 phone that we already paid.
Some of the staff need a serious overhaul here, but disappointed in this Apple Store overall.

originalText.text:
The two greeters ignored us, but greeted others.

We had two great instructors, the help my elder with her Apple products. She LOVED IT! She even returned the following two days for classes and was so grateful she did.

In the evenings after her classes, she stayed on her phone and ipad playing with her new knowledge. She'd owned these items for years, but was never trained on how to use them.

She is no longer afraid to TRY with her phone. She makes herself laugh; just tickled pink, as the saying goes, due to her knew knowledge. She can now help other seniors with their apple products as well as make suggestions for android users.

Thank you Apple!

originalText.text: The help was great. Had to wait for some time, but I actually got what I wanted and got the best help with it from the 1st employee. The employee who finally helped me was able to transfer my data to my new device so I didn't have to do it when I got home (and also informed me I was able to wait to make sure everything was transferred if I wanted he would give me more assistance if it did not go through) which it did üòä.
